vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at Jdg.4.4; married to Deborah (H1683H)
§ Lapidoth = "torches"
the husband of Deborah the prophetess in the time of the judges
vocabInfos._es_Definition: esposo de Débora, profetiza y jueza
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉比多 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "火把(複數)"
士師時代女先知底波拉的丈夫 (士4:4)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉比多 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "火把(复数)"
士师时代女先知底波拉的丈夫 (士4:4)
